   7: module bsg_adder_ripple_carry #(parameter width_p = "inv")
   8:   (
   9:     input [width_p-1:0] a_i
  10:     , input [width_p-1:0] b_i
  11:     , output logic [width_p-1:0] s_o
  12:     , output logic c_o
  13:     );
  14: 
  15:   assign {c_o, s_o} = a_i + b_i;
  16: 
  17: endmodule
